name: HIVESWAP: Act 1
description: A hand-drawn tribute to hilarious '90s adventure games (with none of the accompanying frustration). Play as Joey Claire, a puzzle-solving teen snatched out of her time (1994) and place (Earth) and stranded on a hostile alien planet on the brink of rebellion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: Dual core 2.2GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: Dual core 3.0GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM Storage: 6 GB available space
